name: Noobkillers: Spooky Indie Experiment
description:
YOU WILL GET -------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Beautiful 2D Spooky Art
  • 3 Maps for a perfect Co-op party game
  • Nostalgic Christmas Boss
  • Perfect party game for playing with friends or familly on christmas
  • Cool single player challenge too !
  • Delicious Spooky Halloween Soundtrack

GAME FEATURES ------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Black and White Art Mode
  • Co-Op Online Multiplayer (via Steam Remote Play)
  • SinglePlayer
  • Co-Op Local Multiplayer

GAME CONS ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Lose some friends arguing about the best strategy =(

IMPORTANT NOTE* ---------------------------------------------------------------------
if your team work
is freaking bad
it will probably take
420 tries to beat
the second level
